titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Kensington, the twenty second day of March, 1695/6. In the eighth year of our reign."
Order for the arrest of George Barclay and others involved in assassination plot against William III.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb
